title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in data set editor page of the query tab.
description: When trying to change the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, the children nodes are not being listed.
OB:
1. Open the data set editor page in the query tab.
2. Create a new data set without providing any SQL statement.
3. Choose a new data source that does not have any database/table/column information.
4. Observe that there are no children nodes listed.
EB: When changing the data source for a data set, the children nodes should be listed as expected.
SR:
1. Open the data set editor page in the query tab.
2. Create a new data set without providing any SQL statement.
3. Choose a new data source that should have database/table/column information.
4. Verify that the children nodes are properly listed.
